person.note: Wang(2) Wei(3) [10726] In 1369, Zhu Yuanzhang (Taizu) summoned him to assist in compiling the Yuan Shi. His wife, He(2), from Yiwu has a funerary inscription (CHECK). WDY, 1, 135-136. 元人傳記資料索引, 明人傳記資料索引并記其生年為1322。人名權威資料（中央研究院歷史語言研究所）記其生年作1289。（索引號為：11413）本條資料合并自 person id:67780.
